duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and develop a team of HR professionals in a high growth, rapidly changing environment.
Create a positive work environment and drive solutions for identified problems.
Understand and recommend new approaches, policies, and procedures to drive continual improvements in business objectives and productivity.
Craft integrated talent management solutions that align with the employee life-cycle.
Interface with all levels of the organization and operate with autonomy and discretion.
Monitor and ensure a high level of employee engagement in a 24/7 environment with multiple shifts and significant staffing ramps during seasonal peaks.
Partner with middle and senior management to execute HR strategies that foster organizational and people effectiveness and support business growth.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree from accredited university, Master's Degree or MBA in HRM preferred
